name: Static Sock (ItsSocksAllTheWayDown)
description:
A lost sock, stuck in the Void of Lost Things, bravely traverses the maze of the bedroom floor on a shocking quest to find its way home, collecting friends along the way.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space Bar to shock

Esc to pause

Credits:

Artists: 
Emily Sontheimer
Yiyi Zhang 

Programmers:
Henry Dotson
Rafael Mello

Audio:

Socklings:
